  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:ASP-05500680.005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>ASP-05500680.005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">The Coral Reef Ecosystem - Film</string>
            <string language="en">The Coral Reef Ecosystem - Film</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Écosystème de Récif de corail - Film</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ecosystem Do Recife Coral - Película</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Ecosistema Del Reef Di corallo - Pellicola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το οικοσύστημα κοραλλιογενών υφάλων - ταινία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ecosistema Del Filón Coralino - Película</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">It is currently estimated that there are approximately one million different animal and plant species living in tropical coral reefs. 
<br>In coral reefs, species diversity extends to many different groups, of which many are exclusively marine. This is true of hard corals  the main reef builders.</string>
            <string language="en">It is currently estimated that there are approximately one million different animal and plant species living in tropical coral reefs. In coral reefs, species diversity extends to many different groups, of which many are exclusively marine. This is true of hard corals  the main reef builders.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Koralle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Riff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ökosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reef</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>3</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">On l'estime actuel qu'il y a approximativement un
million d'espèces différentes d'animal et d'usine vivant en 
récifs de corail tropicaux. En récifs de corail, la diversité
d'espèces étend à beaucoup de différents groupes, desquels 
beaucoup sont exclusivement soldat de marine. C'est vrai des 
coraux durs - les constructeurs principaux de récif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estima-se atualmente que há aproximadamente um 
milhão espécies diferentes do animal e da planta que vivem em 
recifes corais tropicais. Nos recifes corais, a diversidade da 
espécie estende a muitos grupos diferentes, de que muitos são 
exclusivamente fuzileiro naval. Isto é verdadeiro de corais 
duros - os construtores principais do recife.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attualmente è valutato che ci sono circa un 
milione di specie differenti della pianta e dell'animale che vivono in
reefs di corallo tropicali. In reefs di corallo, la diversità 
di specie estendere a molti gruppi differenti, di cui molti sono 
esclusivamente fante di marina. Ciò è vero per i corals duri -
i costruttori principali del reef.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτήν την περίοδο υπολογίζεται ότι υπάρχει περίπου 
διαφορετικά ζώο ενός εκατομμυρίου και είδη εγκαταστάσεων 
ζωντανός στις τροπικές κοραλλιογενείς υφάλους. Στις 
κοραλλιογενείς υφάλους, η ποικιλομορφία ειδών επεκτείνεται σε 
πολλές διαφορετικές ομάδες, των οποίων πολλές είναι 
αποκλειστικά θαλάσσιες. Αυτό ισχύει για τα σκληρά κοράλλια
- οι βασικοί οικοδόμοι σκοπέλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se estima actualmente que hay aproximadamente un 
millón diversas especies del animal y de la planta que viven en 
filones coralinos tropicales. En los filones coralinos, la 
diversidad de la especie extiende a muchos diversos grupos, de quienes
muchos son exclusivamente infante de marina. Esto es verdad de 
los corales duros - los constructores principales del filón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Récif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
